data.Title: Google Search Console Link Report Fixed
data.Description: Google has confirmed that the Search Console link report is fixed, resolving the issue of discrepancies in reported link counts.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Algorithm Volatility
data.Description: Intense Google search ranking volatility has been observed, with many tools and SEO community chatter indicating significant fluctuations.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Visibility Drops
data.Description: Google's AI Overviews, previously known as Search Generative Experience in Labs, have decreased in visibility, now appearing for only 15% of queries compared to 84% previously.

data.Title: Google to Still Index Non-Mobile-Friendly Sites After July 5th
data.Description: Google has clarified that it will continue to index websites that are not mobile-friendly after July 5th, as long as they are accessible to the Googlebot smartphone user agent.

data.Title: Google Clarifies Policy on White-Labeled Coupon Sites
data.Description: Google has explicitly stated that using white-labeled coupon content on a website can violate their site reputation abuse policy.

data.Title: Google Search Console Removal Tool No Longer Supports Cache Updates
data.Description: Google Search Console's removal tool has been updated to no longer support cache updates, although snippet update requests are still available.

data.Title: Google Search Console Drops How-To Enhancement Report
data.Description: Google has removed the How-to enhancement report from Google Search Console, following the discontinuation of how-to rich results in search results.

data.Title: Google Business Profile Question and Answers Hidden Bug
data.Description: A bug in Google Business Profile is causing questions and answers to become hidden.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising to Automatically Import Google Ads Conversion Data
data.Description: Microsoft Advertising is planning to automatically import conversion data from Google Ads for advertisers who have previously used Google Ads to Microsoft Ads imports.

data.Title: Google Ads API Version 17 Released
data.Description: Google has released version 17 of the Google Ads API.

data.Title: Google Ads to Drop Old Design
data.Description: Google Ads will be replacing its old design with the new design that has been in testing since 2023, starting on August 30, 2024.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising to Move Smart Shopping Campaigns to Performance Max
data.Description: Microsoft Advertising will be transitioning smart shopping campaigns to Performance Max within the next few months.

data.Title: Google Fixes Issue With Site Names Not Appearing for Internal Pages
data.Description: Google has addressed the issue of site names not appearing for some internal pages, a problem that has persisted since December 2023.
